1_19RagxAc2n7zYdfbfda2Zc4dRoHRJzyAxo.body:
> [chloe](#comment_7_1LJLVfT9hKRuTHzBKTpse57PGfpwx82myR): You don't get spam in your post box do you? Make all post cost a penny or less and only quality things will be posted.

Not sure what postal carrier you have but I get unwanted mail all of the time and that costs money for them to send out.  In fact these deadtree spammers practically pay for the USPS to operate: https://journey24pointoh.com/2012/02/29/the-united-states-postal-service-subsidized-by-junk/
